descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][u]Deutsch
[/u][/b][/size]
[color=#00ff00][size=2]Optionale Mod hinzugefügt
[/size]Patch für Version 1.0.3 hinzugefügt[/color]

[size=2]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=#00ff00][size=4]Version 1.2 (Update)[/size][/color]

- Meshes hinzugefügt

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size]

[color=#00ff00][size=4]Version 1.0.3 (Update)[/size][/color]

- Ausdauer erhöht
- Gesichtsfarben angepaßt

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Imperial Follower (Standalone)

Yulia Donnersturm ist meine erste Follower-Mod für Skyrim, daher bin ich für Anregungen und 
Verbesserungsvorschläge sehr dankbar.

Yulia verfügt über eine kleine Steigerung der Gesundheit und Ausdauer, hat dafür aber einen Malus in 
Magicka.

Heiratsfähig / Levelt mit Spieler

Ihr findet sie in der Haupthalle von Jorrvaskr in Weißlauf.


[b][u][size=3]Kompatibilität (TES5 Edit getestet):[/size]
[/u][/b]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SeveNBase - a custom FemaleBodyReplacer
(by Crosscrusade / DeMoNhUnTeR1986 / Sevennity)[/url]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/?]UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul (by fLokii / Vamyan)[/url]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14950/?]Convenient Horses - Komfortable Pferde - German Version
(by Alek / Mitchalek / Bulwyf / Deigradius)[/url]

- für alle Bodyskins


[b][u][size=3]Anforderungen:[/size]
[/u][/b]
- Skyrim 1.9.32.0.8 (by Bethesda)

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_6_Full (by Apachii)


[/url][b][u][size=3]Empfehlungen:[/size][/u][/b]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65479/?]Remodeled Armor for SeveNBase BombShell HDT TBBP (by [b]RickerHK)[/b][/url]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[size=3][b][u]English[/u][/b][/size]

[color=#00ff00]Added optional mod
Added patch for version 1.0.3[/color]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=#00ff00][size=4]Version 1.2 (Update)[/size][/color]

- Added meshes

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=#00ff00][size=4]Version 1.0.3 (Update)[/size][/color]

[size=2]- Increases stamina
- Adapted facial colors

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size]

Imperial Follower (Standalone)

Yulia Thunderstorm is my first mod for Skyrim, so I am very grateful for suggestions and improvements.

Yulia has a small increase in health and stamina, but has a penalty in magicka.

Marriageable / Level-up with player

You can find her in the main hall of Jorrvaskr in Whiterun.


[b][u][size=3]Compatibility (TES5 Edit tested):[/size]
[/u][/b]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SeveNBase - a custom FemaleBodyReplacer
(by Crosscrusade / DeMoNhUnTeR1986 / Sevennity)[/url]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/?]UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul (by fLokii / Vamyan)[/url]

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14950/?]Convenient Horses - Comfortable horses - German Version
(by Alek / Mitchalek / Bulwyf / Deigradius)[/url]

- for all bodyskins


[b][u][size=3]Requirements:[/size]
[/u][/b]
- Skyrim 1.9.32.0.8 (by Bethesda)

- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_6_Full (by Apachii)

[/url]
[b][u][size=3]Recommendations:[/size]

[/u][/b] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65479/?]Remodeled Armor for SeveNBase BombShell HDT TBBP (by [b]RickerHK)[/b][/url]
author: Drebing
